summary: Get the penalty point records generated in the current quarter
description: Get the penalty point records generated in the current quarter.

query.name: page_no
query.description: Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call. Default is 1.

query.name: page_size
query.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), and the "page_no" to start next call. This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data. The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100. Default is 10.

query.name: punishment_status
query.description: The status of punishment. Applicable values: 1: Ongoing 2: Ended

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/account_health/get_punishment_history?access_token=access_token&page_no=1&page_size=10&partner_id=partner_id&punishment_status=1&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: punishment_list
schema.description: The punishment records generated in the current quarter.

schema.name: issue_time
schema.description: The time when punishment are issued.

schema.name: start_time
schema.description: Start time in the duration of this punishment record.

schema.name: end_time
schema.description: End time in the duration of this punishment record.

schema.name: punishment_type
schema.description: Punishment Type of this punishment record. Applicable values: 103: Listings not displayed in category browsing 104: Listings not displayed in search 105: Unable to create new listings 106: Unable to edit listings 107: Unable to join marketing campaigns 108: No shipping subsidies 109: Account is suspended 600: Listings not displayed in search 601: Shop listings hide from recommendation 602: Listings not displayed in category browsing 1109: Listing Limit is reduced 1110: Listing Limit is reduced 1111: Listing Limit is reduced 1112: Listing Limit is reduced 2008: Order Limit

schema.name: reason
schema.description: Reason of this punishment record. Applicable values: 1: Tier 1 2: Tier 2 3: Tier 3 4: Tier 4 5: Tier 5 1109: Listing Limit Tier 1 1110: Listing Limit Tier 2 1111: Listing Limit POL

schema.name: reference_id
schema.description: Reference ID for this punishment record.

schema.name: listing_limit
schema.description: Return the specific value of listing limit when punishment_type is: 1109: Listing Limit is reduced 1110: Listing Limit is reduced 1111: Listing Limit is reduced 1112: Listing Limit is reduced

schema.name: order_limit
schema.description: Return the specific percentage of order limit when punishment_type is: 2008: Order Limit Daily Order Limit = X % * L28D ADO (Average Daily Order of this Shop in Past 28 Days)
